item.title: More home builders cut prices to lure buyers put off by high costs
item.description: Builder sentiment fell to the lowest level in seven months, the National Association of Home Builders said.

item.title: U.S. retail sales barely rise, but investors see glimmer of good news in seemingly weak report
item.description: Retail sales barely rose in February, in another sign the economy might be weakening as businesses and consumers digest rapid-fire changes being made ...

item.title: ‘They hate our generation’: My son and daughter-in-law want us to sell our house — and move to Oregon to start a commune
item.description: “They have spent thousands of dollars taking month-long earthship-building classes.”

item.title: Guess could become the next fashion company to go private after stock price halves in a year

item.title: ‘I’ll retire when I’m dead’: My 401(k) lost $50,000 in the market turmoil. I’m in my early 40s. What should I do now?
item.description: “I have no clue how the funds in my 401(k) are invested.”
